articles.description: The LIC Aadhaar Shila plan is a non-linked, participating, individual, life assurance plan that is designed exclusively for women and girl child.
articles.content: LIC Aadhaar Shila Policy:  The Life Insurance Corporation, or LIC, of India is one of the most popular ways to save money for Indians who want a secured future and yet do not want to take any risk in… [+2548 chars]
